word: I have written these things, that Satan may not allure any of my brother ministers or their companions into positions where they will be prevented from doing the very work that the Lord has assigned to them. We must watch; we must pray; and when God says, Whom shall I send to do this errand for Me? we should be ready to respond, "Here am I; send me." Serious work is to be done. It has been waiting for unselfish, consecrated workers.
